name: Go for the bread
description:
Go for the bread is a title with a little objective, we are a knight that have to get the bread to give the breakfast to his princess.

This game was developed as challenge for the metroidvania 2022-February, is very still in development but fortunately is playable to check the controls and the movement and combat system.

Very thanks for the next people to share with me the pixel art that I don't have :P
